name: I AM KILT
description:
Face an endless horde of enemies to survive the clock. Create dynamic builds from a variety of upgrades and synergies to survive 10 minutes. Do you have the forethought and skill to survive?

I AM KILT is an easy-to-pick-up shooter that invites you to discover deeper strategies and explore different builds. The game play balances skill and strategic thinking with luck. Combine active and passive abilities with precise combat to hold out just a little bit longer.
